  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:ME825_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>ME825_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Working on your own mathematics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeiten auf Ihrer eigenen Mathematik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travailler sur vos propres mathématiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalhar em sua própria matemática</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lavorando alla vostra propria matematica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασία στα μαθηματικά σας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajo en sus propias matemáticas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">This unit focuses on your initial encounters with research. It invites you to think about how perceptions of mathematics have influenced you in your prior learning, your teaching and the attitudes of learners.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Teaching</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Teaching_maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Teaching_techniques</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit konzentriert auf Ihr 
Ausgangstreffen mit Forschung. Sie lädt Sie ein, zu denken an, 
wie Vorstellungen von Mathematik Sie in Ihrem vorherigen Lernen, in 
Ihrem Unterricht und in der Haltung der Anfänger beeinflußt haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité se concentre sur votre rencontre 
initiale avec la recherche. Elle vous invite à penser à la 
façon dont les perceptions des mathématiques vous ont influencé 
dans votre étude antérieure, votre enseignement et les attitudes des
étudiants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade focaliza em seu encontro inicial com 
pesquisa. Convida-o pensar sobre como as percepções da 
matemática o influenciaram na sua aprendizagem prévia, no seu ensino
e nas atitudes dos learners.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità mette a fuoco sul vostro incontro 
iniziale con ricerca. Li invita a pensare a come le percezioni 
della matematica li hanno influenzati vostro imparare anteriore, nel 
vostro insegnamento e negli atteggiamenti dei principianti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα εστιάζει στις αρχικές συγκρούσεις σας 
με την έρευνα. Σας προσκαλεί για να σκεφτεί για το πώς οι 
αντιλήψεις για τα μαθηματικά σας έχουν επηρεάσει στην 
προγενέστερη εκμάθησή σας, τη διδασκαλία σας και τις τοποθετήσεις
των αρχαρίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad se centra en su encuentro inicial con 
la investigación. Le invita a que piense de cómo las opiniones
de las matemáticas le han influenciado en su aprender anterior, su 
enseñanza y las actitudes de principiantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teaching_maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teaching_techniques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Teaching_maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Teaching_techniques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ensino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teaching_maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teaching_techniques</string>

          <keyword>
